notes.scm:Note: Factored WebUI resolution and sequencing logic out of UIServlet into UIService so it can be shared with new UIFilter to create filter based WebUI interfaces.

RootComponent.contextRelativePath is now RootComponent.instancePath for better clarity. Multiple instances of the same RootComponent will be bound into different paths in the application context tree. Each "instance" may have an arbitrary number of sessions associated with it.

UICache identifies a bound RootComponent instance by an instancePath, which is derived from the ServletContext. This identification is independent of the actual webui resource, which is passed in as a parameter.
Moved Session resolution and creation to static method in Session from UIServlet
FileInput updated to accept tag properties.
ServiceContext no longer references UIServlet- references the ServletContext root Resource instead. This only affects FileInput.
RootComponent.findChannel(Focus) static method
Factor Servlet/Filter ServletContext relationship into new ContextAdapter to simplify supporting both Servlet and Filter constructs in the the same code.
Removed Servlet reference from HttpFocus and explicitly pass ServletContext to HttpFocus can work with filters. Removed init() method in favor of constructor based init.
Factored common AutoFilter code into base class to clean up unnecessary boilerplate abstract method implementations.
FocusFilter prevents pattern restriction due to requirement that it always be in the chain and available for binding. Supports override point to run code in the thread context.
RequestFocusFilter adds releaseValue() override to allow subtypes to reliably provide additional thread context.
Updated Editor components to find the contextual DataSession in a more concise manner.
TupleEditor now provides an onSave property to evaluate an expression after a successful save.
Editors now provide a "postAssignments" property to unconditionally update data immediately after a save request is received.
Login now supports an onLogin binding property to evaluate an expression after a successful login.
Updated to reflect refactored Authenticator from spiralcraft-core and incorporate passive credentials by calling authenticate() when session is started and by calling refresh() on every request.

Removed preMessage() and postMessage() bracketing call in Component because it did not provide significant benefits over simply overriding message() in subclasses. Reverted AbstractCommandContol to use message() override to push command context.
Make sure that html extensions of AbstractCommandControl call super.bindSelf() from bindSelf()
WebUI component inheritance hierarchy enhancements
Provide hooks in webui.Component for subclasses to bracket a call to "message()" with a context insertion. Allows controls that don't inherit from ControlGroup a way to publish context to children.
Provide an appropriately typed getState(EventContext) method to clean up many ugly State casts inside just about every component. Required making most State classes publicly visible.
Abstracted functionality for Command processing controls into AbstractCommandControl.java
Move AutoFilter abstract components to their own package. Many artifacts trivially affected by package change not itemized.
Provide abstractions for Filters that publish arbitrary session or request scoped objects into an application.
Exposed RadioButton html tag for customization
Provide "touchNew" property so Editor triggers on-save assignments even when no input was provided.
Provide "touchWhenX" property so Editor triggers on-save assignments when the specified condition evaluates to true immediately before save.
Refactor Scenario and Command usage for 0.4 changes
Refactor off of deprecated CompoundFocus
StaticsFilter is obsolete
The Paginator now has a resetActionName property.
Conditionally update webui Control binding target only when data has changed from existing target value. "forceUpdate" property to override this default behavior.
Minor code consolidation for creating new buffer

notes.scm:Node: Updated Paginate to handle more efficient ListDecorator where available.
Added proxyURLParameter and permittedAuthorities to allow client driven proxy forwarding for AJAX applications.
Made RootComponent the subject of the compound focus and made ServiceContext reachable only by URI to avoid issues caching transient ServiceContext.

notes.scm:Note: Enhance FormCommand to be useful in more situations by adding a whenX condition and behaving as expected on all combinations of name and whenX properties.
Factored non HTML-specific behavior into AcceptorCommand which will work with other Acceptor implementations.
Add "trim" property to RequestBinding to trim whitespace from input before translating and assigning.
Provide for dynamic HTML attribute generation
Extend binding call to tags from all HTML components
Provide setter for StringConverter
Derive StringConverter from target channel
Factored out unnecessary log instance
Component to fire a command automatically when a page is requested.
Add Assignments (non-default) to DataSessionComponent
Handle SMTP IO exception in control
Implemented RadioButton controls
Factored Select and Option non HTML logic into abstract base types.
Warnings cleanup
Fixed regression where ticket login only ran when the Login was an in-place component in scatter. Ticket is now checked whether or not the Login component is in-place or not.
Warnings cleanup
Renamed UIComponent to RootComponent and textgen/UIUnit to RootUnit to provide a more stable name for use in webui pages that wish to interact with the HTTP level machinery
Added redirectCommand to RootComponent for universal availability
Added redirectCommand to components/Acceptor for convenience.
Added FOCUS_URI static to ServiceContext to assist binding to the thread-local published in RootComponent
SMTP interface improvements- added senderX and recipientX properties, trap template exceptions
Added debugLevel setting for HttpServlet
Clear any pending responsive actions if the response is out of sequence
Fix- AggregateEditor no longer prepends fixedAssignments and defaultAssignments defined at the Type level as these assignments are applied at the store layer. This undoes the 2009-06-05 mod.
Fix- TupleEditor now sets newAssignments before requestBindings, because requestBindings will dirty the Tuple and prevent newAssignments from running.
Bug fixes for cross-server login functionality
Make sure Login writes a login cookie regardless of persistence setting when SecurityFilter.requireValidCookie is set
Only re-validate cookie when already authenticated
Put cookie value into debug log
Remove usage of auto-encoding part of URI API to avoid erroneous encoding and decoding of URI data.
ProxyFilter no longer decodes query string part of the proxyURI property
RedirectFilter no longer decodes query string of request URL when transferring it to the redirect URL
Added better debugging control to ServiceContext
ServiceContext redirect computation no longer uses multi-argument encoding constructors for URI
Redirect component no longer decodes and encodes query string when computing redirect
Login component will always write a cookie when the SecurityFilter.requireValidCookie property is set, regardless of the "isPersistent" property on the LoginEntry
Added requireValidCookie property to SecurityFilter, which triggers a logout when the cookie is removed or no longer matches the current authentication session.
Generics updates related to Editors and BufferChannel
Added setter for mergeQuery

Redirect now substitutes request URI components where they are not specified in the redirectURI, which allows redirecting to the same resource on a different server, a different resource on the same server, a different scheme on the same server, a different query, etc.
Redirect automatically avoids a redirect to the same location
Redirect accepts a locationX property to dynamically supply the redirect URI.
Fixed NPE in debug output code
Login: Check cookie on scatter(), not just at PREPARE, so non-responsive requests apply cookie check early.
SecurityFilter: Avoid reading cookie in same request after a logout has been performed to avoid immediate but unremembered re-login.
If cookieDomain is set to ".", it will be treated as if no cookie domain was specified
Form now accepts a tag.name property for client-side AJAX binding support.
Allow setting of cookieDomain in SecurityFilter

AggregateEditor has contentRequired and contentRequiredMessage properties, and will throw an error during save if contentRequired=true and the list doesn't contain at least one saveable (non-padding) entry.
Fix: ProxyFilter checks for null ContentType before copying to outgoing connection
Implemented RequestDataFilter queryBinding setter
Prepend fixedAssignments from element Type to configured fixedAssignments in AggregateEditor
Bug fix: ControlGroup didn't use parent control to generate variable name.
ControlGroup now provides a bean property to specify the variable name prefix used to generate the client-side formvar name.
Added filters to provide logic and state functionality
SharedDataFilter provides a Type instance shared across the Servlet context.
RequestDataFilter provides a Type instance scoped to the current request which can provide access to request parameters
GuardFilter manages access to resources via a boolean Expression and a custom status result.
Bug fix: ControlGroup rule should bind against the stateful target object, not the parent focus.
Bug fix: Transaction should roll back when an error state results from a message.
Bug fix: EditorBase should run post-save command only on error free return from save message (post-order)
Provide bean properties for specifying dataURI and configURI mapped to context://data and context://config respectively, to provide for external data directory.
Added padSize and padX properties to maintain a pad of new BufferTuples that can be edited simultaneously
Fix NPE in AggregateEditor while binding when a data field has a defaultExpression but there are no defaultExpressions set up in the Editor.
Provide expression based query params to ProxyFilter
Moved VariableMapBinding to more common spiralcraft.net.http package in spiralcraft-net module
Updated AggregateEditor for ArrayUtil genericization
Added a loginCommand(Command onSuccess) method to Login to support performing an immediate action on login success.
PageAction no longer queues its command, by default. The command will execute when the action is invoked, or queue="true" must be specified to queue it for the next Command cycle.
Provide a CONSTANT scope for the ReferenceFocusFilter to make objects available at bind time.
Pre-release cleanup
Remove debug message in editorbase
Flatfile form writer util updated for data/Space refactor
Integrate textgen StateFrame solution into WebUI.
Add postPrepare hook to Component to perform post-order operations
Add methods for Servlet 2.4 compatibility
Refactor for AbstractXmlObject.create() change
